_meta.root_cause_context: Created to externalize hardcoded validation logic from commit f0cc710. See docs/dev/completion-20260212-175337.md for refactoring details.

_english_placeholders_description: List of English placeholder words that indicate untranslated/incomplete content in name_local fields. Validation will flag these as LOW severity issues.
_currency_region_map_description: Map of lowercase city/region names to expected currency codes (e.g., {'beijing': 'CNY', 'tokyo': 'JPY'}). DISABLED by default (set to {}) for the following reasons: (1) Violates DRY principle - trip metadata should be the source of truth, (2) Requires code changes for every new region, (3) Duplicates information that should come from trip metadata. If you need currency validation, populate trip-level metadata with expected currency instead of hardcoding here.
_currency_region_map_status: DEPRECATED - Do not enable unless absolutely necessary. Future versions may remove this validation entirely.
_intentional_overlap_keywords_descriptio: Keywords in timeline activity names that indicate intentional time overlaps. When detected, overlap warnings are downgraded from MEDIUM to INFO severity.
_enforce_title_case_description: Whether to enforce Title Case formatting for type_base fields (e.g., 'Shopping Mall' instead of 'shopping mall'). Set to false to disable this check.
